summary: This module contains unit tests for the CILogon OAuth authenticator, providing helper utilities and a comprehensive suite of test cases that validate configuration handling, IDP selection logic, scope validation, and deprecation behavior of the authenticator.
business_intent: To guarantee that the CILogon authenticator integrates securely with JupyterHub by correctly processing configuration options, enforcing allowed identity providers, handling OAuth scopes, and issuing appropriate warnings for deprecated settings.
